entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 01:40 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: NW 48 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then snow ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 90 km/h gusting to 130 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
